original_text: The soldiers hit Paul and Silas many times. Then they took hold of them and they pushed them into the prison. The officers said to the prison guard, ‘Lock the prison door carefully so that these men cannot get free.’
korean_text: 많이 친 후에 옥에 가두고 간수에게 명하여 든든히 지키라 하니

sentences.original_text: The soldiers hit Paul and Silas many times
Then they took hold of them
and they pushed them into the prison
The officers said to the prison guard
so that these men cannot get free
